string-array.name: StandardHymnsArray
string-array.item: According to Your mercy O Lord

string-array.name: StandardHymnsArrayLyrics
string-array.item:
Abanal lazee fel samawat, leyataqadas esmak, le ya’tee malakoutak, le takon masheeatak,

kama fel sama’ kazalek 3alal ard, khobzana kafafana, a3tenal youm, wa eghfer lana zenobana, kama naghfer nahno aydan lel moznebeen elayna,

wa la tod khellna fei tagreba, laken nageena menal shereer. Belmaseeh yasou3 rabena le-ana lakal molk wal qowah wal magd elal abad. Amen.
Wanatazer key-ya-ma al-amwat wa hayet daher altee amen.

Efrahi ya Mariam, al-abda wa al-omo, le-an-al-lazi fee heg-raki, al-mala-eka tosa-beha-ho. 


Wa-al-sha-robim yasgodo-na laho be-esteh-qak. Wa al-serafim be-ghair fotor.


Laisa lana dalah `end rabana Yaso al-masseh sewa tel-batoke wa shafa-atoke, ya saieda-tena kol-ena waledat al-elah.


Leekay nosab-behaka ma-a al-sherobim wa al-serafim, saree-khena ka-eleen.


Kodos, kodos, kodos, ayoha al-rabo al-dabet el-kol. A-sama wa al-ardo mam-lo-atane men mag-deka wa kra-mateka.


Nas-alak ya Ebn Allah, an tahfaz haiat bat-reiar-kena al-baba al-anba Shenoda ra-eso al-kahana, sabet-ho ala korseh.
Al Sharobeem yasgoodona lak wa Seraphim yo magedo nak. Sare-kheen ka e-leen. Kodos, kodos, kodos, Rubo sabahoot. Al sama wal ard do malo a tan nee min men de kal ak-das.
Erhamna ya Allah da bit til kol
Kama kan ha ka za ya kol min gilen e la gil wa ela da he de hor Amen.
Barakat-hom mo kadasat fel ta kol ma na Amen. El magd do lak ya Rub. Ya Rubo erham. Ya Rubo erham. Ya Rubo barekna. Ya Rubo nay-ye-hom. Amen.

Sabe-hoollah fee gamea-a kideeseen 


✜ Sabehoo fee galad kou-wati-hee 


Sabehoo ala mag derati-hee 


✜ Sabehoo ka kasarat aza mati-hee 


Sabehoo o beh sout el bouk 


✜ Sabehoo beh mizmarin wa keethar 


Sabehoo beh dou-foo-fin wa sou-foon 


✜ Sabehoo beh awtarin wa orgoon 


Sabehoo besnogin hasinat el-soout 


✜ Sabehoo besnogin talee 


Kouloo nasma fel to sabeh esmil rub e-lah na

string-array.name: HomeDescArray
string-array.item: Days in which no feast/fast is observed
From the Feast of the Resurrection to Pentecost
